full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Solicitation Information

- **Title**: W0133-21T025 B - Accommodations Booking Software
- **Reference Number**: WS 3799446566
- **Amendment Number**: 2
- **Publication Date**: March 22nd, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date**: May 3rd, 2023 2:00 PM
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: April 5th, 2023
- **Expected Contract End Date**: May 30th, 2024

## Notice Details
**Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
**Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
**Trade Agreements**: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement
**Regions of Delivery**: British Columbia

**Contact Information**

- **Contracting Agency**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (DND)
- **Contracting Agency Address**:
  - 11, rue Laurier
  - Phase III, Place du Portage
  - Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5
- **Agency Contact**:
  - Hélène Kobenter
  - Phone: Not Available
  - Email: [helene.kobenter@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:helene.kobenter@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Notice URL**: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15766972?extsite=MTU3NjY5NzJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

## Tender Description
The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking supply and delivery of licensed accommodations booking software with maintenance and support services to their 19 Wing Comox, Lazo, BC location. The response deadline for all bids is May 3rd, 2023. A debriefing or feedback session can be requested by those who submit bids for this solicitation.
